channel.title: Comments on: Add an Instagram Feed to Your Site Footer
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/add-an-instagram-feed-to-your-site-footer/#comment-586">Scott Wyden Kivowitz</a>.
Awesome, missed this one, thanks for adding!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Scott Wyden Kivowitz.

Awesome, missed this one, thanks for adding!

item.title: By: Scott Wyden Kivowitz

item.description: Brian shares how they added the Instagram widget to one of the latest StudioPress themes.
item.content:encoded: Brian shares how they added the Instagram widget to one of the latest StudioPress themes.
